item.title: Clock
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

Get your system time down to the millisecond. Its very pointless but cool for a couple of minutes.

[scar]var time:integer;

begin
repeat
time:= getsystemtime;
writeln(inttostr(time));
until(false);
end.[/scar]
and if the script comes up all on one line try this.

var time:integer;

begin
repeat
time:= getsystemtime;
writeln(inttostr(time));
until(false);
end.

and if it happens again just download the link.

Read full topic
